contract-parts.text: Explain the three core elements of a _Contract_ (a set-based representation of function machines): Name, Domain, and Range

contract-use.text: Use Contracts to apply functions that produce Numbers, Strings, and Images

data-types-identify.text: Identify examples of the following data types: Numbers, Strings, and Booleans
